alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 15 at 8:39PM MST until February 16 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Tularosa Basin, El Paso Metro, and Far West Texas including El Paso, Hudspeth, Otero, and southern Dona Ana Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reductions in visibility due to blowing dust are likely. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
